attributes.action: Limit migration levels to stop jobs being taken off British workers, especially in times of economic downturn, where people are losing their jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As every single person in our country knows, millions of people are out of work, and, therfore, are looking for a job to generate income. However, one thing that is being over-looked is the number of migrant workers coming into our country, and taking the jobs that British citizens want and need

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Limit migration levels to stop jobs being taken off British workers, especially in times of economic downturn, where people are losing their jobs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20276


Prime Minister's Office
